widget.author: cryptofuture
widget.description: You can take your password card in any place you go. Application don't need extra permissions or internet access. And it runs locally. The idea is simple: generate a password card that has your passwords printed in the card IN PLAIN TEXT. Take card with you, and you have access to passwords for every account you have, and if an attacker get access to your card, you'll have time to change your password.
widget.name: PassCard
